articles.content: The daily figures released by NHS England on Monday day showed that there had been five deaths on December 23, four on December 24, six on Christmas Day, six on Boxing Day and four on December 27 the… [+2067 chars]

articles.title: 24 areas most at risk of Tier 4 as tier review due in two days - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The government is set to review the rules with the potential for the whole of England to be moved into Tier 4
articles.content:
Millions more people could be put under Tier 4 restrictions as the tier review is due in two days.
